Instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C. Mix butter and sugar, add eggs and vanilla, then fold in flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips. Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Ingredients: 250g all-purpose flour,125g butter,100g sugar,1 egg,5g vanilla extract,3g baking soda,150g chocolate chips

Instructions: Mix mascarpone, sugar, and egg yolks. Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer with mascarpone mixture. Repeat and top with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
Ingredients: 250g mascarpone cheese,100g sugar,3 egg yolks,200g ladyfingers,300ml brewed coffee,20g cocoa powder

Instructions: Prepare a pastry dough and chill. Slice apples and mix with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice. Roll out dough, fill with apples, cover with top crust, and bake at 190°C for 45 minutes.
Ingredients: 300g all-purpose flour,150g butter,50g sugar,4 apples,50g brown sugar,5g cinnamon,10ml lemon juice
